title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and active, allowing the user to scroll vertically and horizontally.
EB: The expected behavior is that the scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example, preventing the user from scrolling vertically and horizontally.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the ImageAnalyzer example and observe that the scrollbars are active and allow vertical and horizontal scrolling.
